name: Aghanim
unlock_text: This is a free God that is permanently unlocked by completing the 7-day newcomer quest

powers.name: Sorcery for Dummies: Volume 1
powers.desc: Has a chance to upgrade a random spell on your team every round (includes any unequipped spells). Cannot upgrade the same spell consecutive times. Chance scales with shop level.

name: Alchemist
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Greevil's Greed
powers.desc: Your gold never resets. For every 10/9/8/7/6 gold saved at the end of combat, you gain 1 additional gold. Amount of gold required depends on the level of your shop.

powers.name: Unstable Concoction
powers.desc: Every round loss will gain a charge to this ability. Any win resets the charges to 0. If the charges reach 3, you will take 15% current HP in damage and the charges will reset to 0. Charges can not be less than 0.

name: Bathtime Aghanim
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Sorcery for Dummies: Volume 4
powers.desc:
For 1 round, a random ability will be upgraded to a higher threshold.
		
		You can have up to 3 abilities upgraded depending on the shop level.
        
        Shop Level 2: Upgrades 1 skill from 1-2 points to 3
        Shop Level 4: Upgrades 1 skill from 3-5 points to 6
        Shop Level 5: Upgrades 1 skill from 6-8 points to 9

name: Bloodseeker
unlock_text: This God is free and permanently unlocked

powers.name: Blood Frenzy
powers.desc: Each ally hero death will enfrenzy selected unit with attack speed and lifesteal.

name: Boneless Aghanim
unlock_text: This God is temporarily unlocked by subscribing to PLUS. They are permanently unlocked if they drop from a God chest

powers.name: Sorcery For Dummies: Volume 3
powers.desc: Ultimates never enter your pool of spells. You gain extra shop slots at shop level 3, and shop upgrades cost less.

name: The Boomer
unlock_text: This God is free and permanently unlocked

powers.name: Bile Explosion
powers.desc: Ally heroes will explode on death dealing damage in area. Damage dealt is a percentage of the damage taken that round. After exploding, a puddle of bile will remain on the ground that will cause enemies to take extra damage. Debuff is stackable.

name: Brewmaster
unlock_text: Why are you even seeing this God?

powers.name: Brewling Stance
powers.desc: Toggle between Brewling states, changing what unique abilities you possess.

powers.name: Primal Spirit
powers.desc: Selected unit transforms into a Brewling, gaining special abilities and the Brewling's attack range. The abilities gained depend on which Brewling Stance is active.

name: Cave Johnson
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Mantis Radiation
powers.desc:
Your heroes cannot heal, but gain a powerful mutation based on their primary attribute:
    Strength - Reduces all damage taken by 30%.
    Agility - Reduces base attack time by 25%.
    Intelligence - Reduces mana cost of abilities by 100%.

name: Centaur
unlock_text: This God is free and permanently unlocked

powers.name: Great Fortitude
powers.desc: Selected hero will gain HP per round. They will also return a percent of damage dealt by physical attack. When a new hero is selected, the entire HP buff moves to them.

name: Chaos God
unlock_text: Why are you even seeing this God?

powers.desc: Magical damage per second is dealt to both allies and enemies (not lethal). This is a temporary God that will be removed from your armory after Season 2

name: Sideshop Man
unlock_text: God is permanently unlocked by reaching a battlepass level

powers.name: Going Out of Existence Sale
powers.desc: First re-roll is always free, and spells sell for full value.Voiced by our dear friend Purge

name: Counter-Terrorist
unlock_text: God is permanently unlocked by reaching a battlepass level

powers.name: Equipment
powers.desc: Each time you upgrade the shop, you are presented with a choice of three pieces of equipment. The chosen piece will appear in your arena and activate its effect when the round begins. You can move the equipment by dragging and dropping it.Original concept by: Ladde

powers.name: Decoy Grenade
powers.desc: Creates an illusion of the closest ally or enemy hero. After a short delay, the illusion will taunt the first enemy within certain range

powers.name: Flashbang
powers.desc: Creates a flash of light at the chosen location, blinding enemies and allies to miss on attacks. It also releases shrapnel, adding a debuff that increases damage of spells. Miss chance is lowered per second.

powers.name: HE Grenade
powers.desc: Deals damage in an area and pushes units away from the center point. This affects both allies and enemies.

powers.name: Smoke Grenade
powers.desc: Silences enemies or allies in an area.

powers.name: Incendiary Grenade
powers.desc: Sets an area ablaze that slows and deals damage over time to both allies and enemies.

powers.name: Riot Shield
powers.desc: Damage reduction is applied to both ally and enemy units in the area for a set duration.

name: Dazzle
unlock_text: This God is free and permanently unlocked

powers.name: Shallow Grave
powers.desc: Cast Shallow Grave on the first ally to fall within 20% HP threshold. Duration is based on shop level.

powers.name: Cheating Death
powers.desc: Your god will survive a death blow (goes down to 1 hp).

name: Donkey Aghanim
unlock_text: This God is temporarily unlocked by subscribing to PLUS. They are permanently unlocked if they drop from a God chest

powers.name: Sorcery For Dummies: Volume 2
powers.desc: Heroes can use multiple ultimates, but shop upgrades are more expensive

name: Dr. Kleiner
unlock_text: God is permanently unlocked by reaching a battlepass level

powers.name: Research
powers.desc: You cannot re-roll normally. Whenever you purchase a spell, the shop is automatically re-rolled.Original concept by: Pio_Romero

powers.name: Breakthrough!
powers.desc: When a certain amount of spells are sold, all your heroes gain a permanent buff to intelligence.Original concept by: Pio_Romero

name: Faceless Void
unlock_text: God is permanently unlocked by reaching a battlepass level

powers.name: Time's Bond
powers.desc: Select a spell in the shop to individually lock it. You have a limited amount of locks that scale with shop level.

powers.name: The March of Time
powers.desc: Every time a re-roll occurs, each spell affected by  Time's Bond has a separate chance to have its gold cost reduced.

name: The Gambler
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Roll the Dice
powers.desc: Before your next fight, make a bet. If you win the next round, gain gold in the next shopping phase. If you lose, you get less gold for the following round. The amount of gold is a range of values based on a your shop level.

name: GLaDOS
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Orange Portal
powers.desc: Target a unit with an Orange Portal. They will gain spell lifesteal, and share all healing and regen with the Blue Portal unit. Spell lifesteal does not stack if both buffs are placed on one unit.

powers.name: Blue Portal
powers.desc: Target a unit with an Blue Portal. They will gain spell lifesteal, and share all healing and regen with the Orange Portal unit. Spell lifesteal does not stack if both buffs are placed on one unit.

name: Icefrog
unlock_text: Why are you even seeing this God?

powers.name: Dev Mode
powers.desc:
At the beginning of the game the player will be given a choice of 5 banned spells. The chosen ability will have 20 copies added to their pool of spells for the remainder of the game. Anytime this ability is purchased in the shop, it will automatically be attached to the Balance in all things ability.
        
        Toggling this ability will change the priority order of the chosen banned spell.Original concept by: ubRtstcl

powers.name: Balance In All Things
powers.desc: Selected unit will have all the purchased copies of the banned ability added as a bonus spell. This does not count towards the four spell hero limit. Upgrading the shop at certain levels will also add a point to this ability.Original concept by: ubRtstcl

name: J'Muy the Wise
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Wisdom of the Elders
powers.desc: Ability cooldowns now pause between rounds, but all abilities have cooldown reduction. Cooldown reduction scales with shop level.

name: Kanna
unlock_text: This God is free and permanently unlocked

powers.name: Prey on the Weak
powers.desc: Selected hero gains 5 attack speed for each ally summon. Summons also gain this amount. You will not lose attack speed if any summons die.

name: Lady Anshu
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Hymn of St. Crella
powers.desc: When selected hero dies, they will revive all dead allied heroes with reduced HP.

name: Legion Commander
unlock_text: This God is free and permanently unlocked

powers.name: Stonehall Pike
powers.desc: Legion Commander God gains damage every round based on the total spell points your team has. Selected ally hero will gain this damage buff.

name: Lifestealer
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Infest
powers.desc: Once selected unit is at 50% HP, they will automatically jump inside a random enemy hero for duration seconds, dealing physical attacks every second. It will also heal you for 10% of Max HP per second. Once the duration is over, the unit will pop out, dealing 0/75/150/225/300 damage in a 400 AOE.

name: Medic
unlock_text: God is permanently unlocked by reaching a battlepass level

powers.name: Uber Charge
powers.desc: Each time a hero is healed for certain amount by the Blitzkrieg target, they will gain spell immunity temporarily.

powers.name: Blitzkrieg
powers.desc: Each time the selected unit heals their team for certain amount, the Blitzkireg target will gain a temporary stack of damage amplification. These stacks work independently from each other. Does not work on lifesteal.

name: Muerta
unlock_text: This God is free and permanently unlocked

powers.name: Phantom's Touch
powers.desc: Description: Every 8 attacks the selected unit will deal a magic damage splash critical strike. The critical strike damage is based on how much spell damage your team has dealt to enemy heroes. When the 8th attack lands, the crit percentage is reset.

name: Nature's Prophet
unlock_text: Why are you even seeing this God?

powers.name: Nature's Prophet
powers.desc: You can position your heroes anywhere on the board.

name: Ogre Magi
unlock_text: This God is free and permanently unlocked

powers.name: Multicast
powers.desc: Selected unit has a chance to multicast a spell. The chance is tied to the amount of total spell points your team has.

name: Phantom Assassin
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Veiled Pact
powers.desc: Your units have a chance to deal a critical strike to enemies. They gain crit damage per number of units they travel. This buff lasts the entire round.

name: Prellex
unlock_text: God is permanently unlocked by reaching a battlepass level

powers.name: Bringer of the Faithful
powers.desc: You are given a melee creep at the beginning of the game. Each time you upgrade shop, you are given a choice of 3 neutral creeps. The skills of the chosen neutral will be added to your creep permanently. Neutral creep choices and your melee creep's stats improve which each shop level. The creep gains damage per round.

name: Primal Beast
unlock_text: God is permanently unlocked by reaching a battlepass level

powers.name: Onslaught
powers.desc: Once per round, Primal Beast can charge through the shop, disrupting spells in his ruinous wake. Spells have a chance to be rerolled, have their cost reduced, or knocked off entirely, leaving the slot empty. Each spell slot has a separate chance to be affected by one of these outcomes.Original concept by: october

name: Pudge
unlock_text: This God is free and permanently unlocked

powers.name: Beefy Boy
powers.desc: Your God has more starting health.

name: Rix, Oathbound
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Oathed
powers.desc: Selected hero is silenced and has bonus damage. If selected unit is revived successfully, the damage buff is doubled.

powers.name: Assault
powers.desc: When an Oathed hero is killed, they will be revived after a delay with reduced HP as long as another ally hero is still alive. When revived, they will respawn in the back of the arena. Each revival will add an additional delay to the respawn time. Timer resets each round.

name: Roshan
unlock_text: God is permanently unlocked by reaching a battlepass level

powers.name: Roshan the Immortal
powers.desc:
Selected hero is replaced by Roshan. Roshan's stats scale as the game goes on. The unit's spells are completely replaced by Roshan's abilities. The potency of Roshan's abilities is based on the amount of spell points the unit has currently equipped in the slot that corresponds to that ability.
        
        Slot 1: Unlocks Spell Block
        Slot 2: Unlocks Bash
        Slot 3: Unlocks Slam
        Slot 4: Unlocks Aegis of the Immortal

        Level One Spell points required: pointsToLevelOne
        Level Two Spell points required: pointsToLevelTwo
        Level Three Spell points required: pointsToLevelThree

name: Rubick
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Spell Steal
powers.desc: Selected unit gains Spell Steal, which upgrades based on how many total spell points you have. Spell Steal does not count towards your four spell hero limit.

name: Rune God
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Fill Bottle
powers.desc:
Selected unit gains a random rune at the beginning of battle. Each shop upgrade will give more runes.
        Tier 4 runes: Water (procs when receiving damage), Haste.
        Tier 3 runes: Invisibility (attacking out of invis deals extra damage), Regeneration (procs when spending mana).
        Tier 2 runes: Bounty (gives the player extra gold for the following round), Illusion.
        Tier 1 runes: Arcane, Double Damage.

        Shop Level 1: Your bottle is empty.
        Shop Level 2: Get a Tier 4 Rune.
        Shop Level 3: Get a Tier 3 & 4 Rune.
        Shop Level 4: Get a Tier 2 ,3 & 4 Rune.
        Shop Level 5: Get a Tier 1, 2, 3 & 4 Rune.

name: Santa Greevil
unlock_text: This God is temporarily unlocked by subscribing to PLUS. They are permanently unlocked if they drop from a God chest

powers.name: Gift Exchange
powers.desc:
An automatic gift exchange takes place at the beginning of every battle. The enemy player has a 5 second window to accept or decline.
	
	The battle winner receives a Good Gift, and the loser a Bad Gift.
	
	Gifts allow you to choose one of 3 random effects to apply to your lineup.
	
	Santa Greevil receives gifts even if the enemy declines the exchange.

name: Selemene
unlock_text: This God is free and permanently unlocked

powers.name: Dark Moon Blessing
powers.desc: Every time an ally hero spends mana, all your heroes gains 0.015% spell amplification. Buff resets every round.

name: Shopkeeper
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked with a specific amount of coins

powers.name: Let's Make a Deal
powers.desc: You can only upgrade your shop to level 3, but all spells cost 2 gold (and sell for 1). The amount of spells that appear in your shop is also reduced to 2/3/4.

name: Sorla Khan
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Warmonger
powers.desc: Sorla Khan deals 2% more damage to other Gods for each surviving ally hero. For every 50 damage she has dealt, her team gains a stacking 8% attack damage buff.

name: Techies
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Squee's Sticky Bomb
powers.desc: For each 350 spell damage applied an enemy unit, a level 2 Sticky Bomb is attached to them.

powers.name: Spoon's Reactive Tazer
powers.desc: 15% chance to trigger a level 1 Reactive Tazer when being attacked by enemies. Has 8 second cooldown.

powers.name: Spleen's Proximity Mine
powers.desc: When attacking a target, there is a 15% chance to lay a level 1 Proximity Mine directly in front of you. Proximity Mine damage reduced by 25%.

name: Terrorist
unlock_text: God is permanently unlocked by reaching a battlepass level

powers.name: Plant Bomb
powers.desc: Bomb is planted at the beginning of the round on a timer. If you lose before the timer runs out, the bomb is defused. However, if the timer expires, the bomb will explode, dealing non-lethal damage to all enemy units. Timer and explosion scale with shop level.

powers.name: Clutch Play
powers.desc: If the bomb explodes and the Terrorist wins, they gain gold the following round. If the opponent defuses the bomb, they get gold the following round.

name: Tinker
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked with a specific amount of coins

powers.name: Rearm
powers.desc: Every round, re-rolls have reduced cost until you buy something or you re-roll a certain amount of times.

name: Tome God
unlock_text: Why are you even seeing this God?

powers.name: Tome of Knowledge
powers.desc: Levels your shop to the next level for free.

powers.name: Tome of Experience
powers.desc: Every time you level your shop, your heroes gain an extra level.

name: Tower God
unlock_text: This God is free and permanently unlocked

powers.name: Building
powers.desc: Once the battle begins, the selected unit cannot move and is rooted, while its attack range is set to a minimum. This root is disabled if you are the last allied hero alive or you are facing a fellow Tower God. Activating this ability will enable your Glyph of Fortification Passive.Voiced by our dear friend PyrionFlax

powers.name: Glyph of Fortification
powers.desc: When a hero dies, all remaining heroes become immune to any kind of damage temporarily. This ability is only active if you are using the Building ability, and your Building unit is alive.Voiced by our dear friend PyrionFlax

name: Toy Pudge
unlock_text: This God is permanently unlocked by dropping from God chests

powers.name: Patchwork Plague
powers.desc: Enemy heroes they take increased spell damage per number of units they travel. This buff lasts the entire round.

name: Vacation Aghanim
unlock_text: God is permanently unlocked by reaching a battlepass level

powers.name: Sorcery For Dummies: Volume 5
powers.desc: Each spell in your shop has a chance to be worth 2 points instead of 1. These spells will cost 4 gold.
